name: Large-scale self-build solutions: European best-practice
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: With reference to a variety of case studies from self-build schemes in Europe, this session asks what have been the lessons learned and what is the self-build landscape in the UK likely to look like in the future?

presentations.name: Overview and case study: Almere, The Netherlands
presentations.speakers: Ted Stevens, Chairman, National Self-Build Association (NASBA)

presentations.name: Case study: resident-owned communities in Europe (and the USA)
Learning from Vauban, Germany and French quarter, Tubingen
presentations.speakers: Marcus Adams, Managing Partner, John Thompson & Partners

presentations.name: Case study: lessons from Europe -  Plymouth housing to Code L6
presentations.speakers: Charles Everard, Director, ZED Factory Ltd
